annotation.spannedText: When it comes to measles, it’s a small world after all

classMention.mentionClass: When it comes to measles, it’s a small world after all

annotation.spannedText: Our ability to hop aboard a plane and arrive a few hours later at “the happiest place on Earth,” coupled with low vaccination rates, has enabled a measles epidemic centered on Disneyland in California to spread thousands of miles from the theme park

classMention.mentionClass: Our ability to hop aboard a plane and arrive a few hours later at “the happiest place on Earth,” coupled with low vaccination rates, has enabled a measles epidemic centered on Disneyland in California to spread thousands of miles from the theme park

annotation.spannedText: a University of Pittsburgh Graduate School of Public Health epidemiologist

classMention.mentionClass: a University of Pittsburgh Graduate School of Public Health epidemiologist

annotation.spannedText: The vaccine for measles is one of the safest, longest-used, most effective vaccines out there

classMention.mentionClass: The vaccine for measles is one of the safest, longest-used, most effective vaccines out there

annotation.spannedText: It has been used all over the world to immunize millions of children and to stop measles epidemics

classMention.mentionClass: It has been used all over the world to immunize millions of children and to stop measles epidemics

annotation.spannedText: those people are protected by “herd immunity” if enough people are immunized

classMention.mentionClass: those people are protected by “herd immunity” if enough people are immunized

annotation.spannedText: Measles will not spread effectively if about 95 percent of the general population is vaccinated against it

classMention.mentionClass: Measles will not spread effectively if about 95 percent of the general population is vaccinated against it

annotation.spannedText: measles is able to spread into and from Disneyland because there is a better chance that an infected person will come in contact with someone else who isn’t vaccinated or doesn’t have full immunity

classMention.mentionClass: measles is able to spread into and from Disneyland because there is a better chance that an infected person will come in contact with someone else who isn’t vaccinated or doesn’t have full immunity

annotation.spannedText: then they’ll get sick and could spread it to someone else, perhaps all within a one-week stay at the theme park

classMention.mentionClass: then they’ll get sick and could spread it to someone else, perhaps all within a one-week stay at the theme park

annotation.spannedText: Mickey Mouse himself – or the employee who dons the ears and hugs the kids – could be spreading the virus since employees who live in the area may be among the group of children who were never vaccinated

classMention.mentionClass: Mickey Mouse himself – or the employee who dons the ears and hugs the kids – could be spreading the virus since employees who live in the area may be among the group of children who were never vaccinated

annotation.spannedText: For the best experience in Disneyland or other parks ... make sure your children are vaccinated before you go

classMention.mentionClass: For the best experience in Disneyland or other parks ... make sure your children are vaccinated before you go
